title: Why are there un marked black helicopters flying around wilmington?
text:
The problem with unmarked helicopters is that it's hard to find out
who's flying them.



We do have a related answer about police helicopters:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12



Since that answer was written, Wilmington and New Hanover County have
merged their helicopter programs.



And here's a link to a recent column by Si Cantwell about one of the
SABLE pilots:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20120121/COLUMNIST/120129956
